Introduction

PSY, whose real name is Park Jae Sang, is a South Korean singer, rapper, and television personality. He started his music career in 2001 with his debut album Psy from the Psycho World!, becoming known in South Korea for his controversial and satirical style. His bold and humorous approach made him stand out in the music scene.

In 2012, PSY gained worldwide fame with his song "Gangnam Style" and its colorful music video. The video became a global sensation and was the first to reach one billion views on YouTube, making PSY an international icon.

In 2018, PSY founded P Nation, which has been home to notable artists, including Jessi, Hyuna, Dawn, Crush, and the boy group TNX.
